name: St. Mary Magdalene

locations.description: Witness to the Resurrection in Jerusalem

summary: Mary Magdalene was a devoted follower of Jesus Christ and one of the women who supported his ministry. She is most famous for being the first witness to the Resurrection of Jesus, earning her the title 'Apostle to the Apostles.' According to the Gospels, she was present at the Crucifixion and was the first to see the risen Christ. Tradition holds that she later traveled to France to preach the Gospel.
